name: zomato
description: Zomato is an online and mobile restaurant search and discovery service, providing in-depth information for over 1 million restaurants across 22 countries. Zomato's core content features include menus, photos, and geocoded coordinates for restaurants. Users can rate and review restaurants, as well as create their own network of foodies.So, we are going to build backend system of zomato with NodeJS, Javascript, Postman, AWS S3, Redis, and PostgreSQL
author: Ankit Sathiya,Himanshu Chauhan
